templates.name: Can I receive my order by a certain date?
templates.content:
Good question! If you have a special event or occasion that requires your garments to be delivered by a specific date, please contact us at: hello@sebastiancruzcouture.com

We are happy to look into this for you.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/sebastiancruzcouture/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/SebastianCruzCouture/

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/returns

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at  hello@sebastiancruzcouture.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/rewards

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at hello@sebastiancruzcouture.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on all domestic orders!

templates.name: Can I customize my pocket square?
templates.content: Yes! We often do events and weddings where clients request a specific combination of colors to match their ensemble and/or event. As long as fabrics are in stock and colors are available, we can do any custom combination! Please note, custom pocket squares are not returnable or exchangeable.

templates.name: Can I customize my jacket?
templates.content: Yes! You can change the lapel cut and even the color to achieve a specific contrasting look. Simply purchase the jacket or look you want, then email us at hello@sebastiancruzcouture.com immediately after your checkout. Send in your order number and details of customization, and we'll make the modifications to your order!

templates.name: What happens if I receive my jacket and itâ€™s a little too tight?
templates.content: The beauty is that all of our jackets are handmade with an extra 4" of fabric on the inside. With just basic tailoring, you can even make it up to 2 sizes bigger!

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at  hello@sebastiancruzcouture.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Can I return my custom jacket and/or other custom items for a refund?
templates.content: Customized items aren't returnable, as they are made specifically for you based on your own measurements, creations, and ideas. Exceptions will be allowed if there is an error on our end. You can learn more about our return policy here: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/returns

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 833-643-6264 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: All of our garments are handmade for every customer! The process is quick, 8-12 business days. Shipping is usually just an additional 2-3 business days. Orders containing just accessories will ship within 24-48hrs. Because all of our items are handmade, we encourage you to place your order as soon as possible.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! All of our garments are true to size and handmade with 4" extra fabric on the inside of every corner. This allows you to easily tailor your garments up to two sizes (bigger or smaller) without having to worry about sending them back. We always recommend purchasing our garments in the same size you typically wear. If you're unsure of your size you can always use our Find Your Fit section on our website: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/find-your-fit

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We are 100% online, and we do not operate from retail locations.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We ship from Atlanta, GA and manufacture everything in our Headquarters in Como, Italy.

templates.name: Do you have a catalog?
templates.content: We actually consider our website as our catalog now. Websites are digital catalogs that are actually shoppable. We don't have tangible books showcasing everything we have on our website for sale. Let me know if you need further help.

templates.name: Size Chart: Men - Shoes
templates.content: You can take a look at our men's size chart here: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/shoes-size-chart

templates.name: Size Chart: Men - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our men's size chart here: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/find-your-fit

templates.name: How do I know my measurements?
templates.content:
It's actually very easy to get your measurements taken care of. Simply take a look at our find your fit video and within 5 minutes you can have all your accurate measurements. Then, when you add the pieces to your cart select "custom" for the sizes, add your measurements in the notes section on the cart page, and complete your order. We will receive your order with your measurements.

Find your fit video: https://iheartraves.attn.tv/akPp7m4v-1cN

templates.name: Customer sends us their measurement/ asks about custom order sizing
templates.content: Please select "custom" for the size instead of a specific size then complete the checkout and send us your order number along with the measurements.

templates.name: Lose weight
templates.content: All the best on your weight loss journey! All of our pieces are limited, so you don't want to miss out on the look you want. You can always alter the garments two sizes bigger or smaller anytime.

templates.name: Products too expensive
templates.content:
Thank you for your feedback. We have The Vault collection that you can check out for affordable options: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/collections/the-vault 
If you have any questions, just reach out, and I'd love to help!

templates.name: I know my jacket size, but I'm not sure what vest/waistcoat size to get?
templates.content: If you already know your jacket size, we recommend ordering the same size for your vest. The fit is designed to be consistent, so sticking with your usual jacket size should work perfectly!
